page.title: 02MR. BELLAMY - A FARMER
page.content: Mr Bellamy has a farm of{400 acres which he rents from the{Arranstone Estate. His{family have farmed it {for over 100 years. 25 years ago there were{8 men and 14 horses}working on the land; now there are{2 men}who work for Mr Bellamy{and 5 tractors.}He does not think the land could be worked with fewer men. He works{7 {days a week, the 2 men work for 5 {days a week. }It is a{mixed farm, with{30 beef cattle}and crops of {potatoes, corn}and{sugar beet. }He thinks the{EEC subsidies}for farmers are{necessary,}but{distributed very {badly.}He does not think there is much hope of the system being improved. He has pulled out a number of{hedges over the years, but won't pull any more as it makes the fields too open and exposed to the weather. He does not believe in change without reason.
